NK040(thi)053:1: // bla ma mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub pa mkha' 'gro'i srog 'dren bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)053:3: ma rigs drug snang srid lha 'dre rnams //
NK040(thi)053:4: sems snyem thag chod par skyabs su mchi //
NK040(thi)053:5: bka' zab mo gcod yul nyams len gyis //
NK040(thi)053:6: bdud chos skur grol bar sems bskyed do //
NK040(thi)053:9: ma h+aa shu nya rig pa rang byung ka dag cing //
NK040(thi)053:10: lhun grub rol rtsal gdal ba la //
NK040(thi)053:11: kun la khyab pa'i ye shes che //
NK040(thi)053:12: dmigs bsam bral ba bzo med ngang //
NK040(thi)053:14: rgyan dang cha lugs yongs rdzogs par //
NK040(thi)053:15: gri gug thod pa kha t+w+aam bcas //
NK040(thi)053:16: brkyang bskum gar gyis pad nyir ro'i //
NK040(thi)053:17: snying khar bardzisa bzhugs ye shes dang //
NK040(thi)053:19: spyi bor pad zlar bla ma dang //
NK040(thi)053:20: dbyer med yum chen sku mdog ser //
NK040(thi)053:21: phyag gnyis mnyam bzhag rdo rje ni //
NK040(thi)053:22: rtse lnga langs stabs bsnams pa bsam //
NK040(thi)053:23: zhabs gnyis rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs //
NK040(thi)053:26: rgyud bskul ye shes lha'i rnam pa //
NK040(thi)053:27: char bzhin bab ste thim nas 'dres //
NK040(thi)053:28: mchod tshogs sprin bzhin 'khrigs pas mchod //
NK040(thi)053:29: bstod dbyangs rgya mtshos snyan sgra sgrogs //
NK040(thi)053:30: dmigs pa ma yengs dad mos sbar //
NK040(thi)053:32: mthar ni yum chen rang la thim //
NK040(thi)053:34: h'u mthing bam dmar gyur pa las //
NK040(thi)053:35: bzlas bya'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsam //
NK040(thi)053:36: +aahmh'u gu ru d+aak+ki ni kro ti ka li bam
NK040(thi)053:37: ha ri ni sa h'u phatah 'od zer lus kun
NK040(thi)053:38: brdal ba las // mkha' 'gro til gang lta bur gtams //
NK040(thi)053:39: de dag sngags dbyangs ldir ba yis //
NK040(thi)053:40: srid pa gsum po dbang bsdus bsam //
NK040(thi)053:42: thun mtshams su tshogs kyi 'khor lo bcas mchod mthar /
NK040(thi)053:43: bskyed par lha yi rnam pa kun //
NK040(thi)053:44: me long has btab bzhin du yal //
NK040(thi)053:45: gnyug ma'i bla ma lhag pa'i lha //
NK040(thi)053:46: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i klong chen por //
NK040(thi)053:47: ji srid bar du g.yo ba bral //
NK040(thi)053:48: sgo gsum ye nas rdo rje gyur //
NK040(thi)053:49: zhes pa'i don la mnyam par gzhag la gnyug ma'i
NK040(thi)053:50: ngang skyong ba 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang
NK040(thi)053:51: mchog la sbyor bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)053:53: chos dbyings rnam dag skye med chos kyi sku //
NK040(thi)053:54: 'gag med rtsa bral sems nyid don gyi yum //
NK040(thi)053:55: mtha' dbus med pa mtha' bral stong pa'i yum //
